"},{"text":"Tunnel Bores","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Tunnel Bores can be crafted to aid in excavation. These bores—or Piston Minecarts—will break blocks and place rails, moving forward.

They can be crafted in a Custom Crafter."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.tunnel_bores.1"}]}]

sections.name: page_1
pages:
["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The recipes for tunnel bores are as follows:"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.tunnel_bores.2"}]},"

  ",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":["Custom Crafter",{"translate":"container.gm4.custom_crafter"}]},"
      ",{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":["☐",{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.empty_slot","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}]},{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":[{"text":"☒","color":"#2e2a28"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.block.minecraft.furnace","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}],"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_item","contents":{"id":"furnace"}}},{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":["☐",{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.empty_slot","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}]},"

sections.name: page_2
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Piston Minecarts are upgraded furnace minecarts and require coal as fuel. To start the bore, use a piece of coal on the bore.\n\nPiston Minecarts will mine (piston-movable) blocks in a 3x3 area centered at the block above it, and place rails on solid blocks in front of it."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.tunnel_bores.3"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Chest Minecarts can be attached to supply the Piston Minecart with rails and coal.\n\nTunnel bores will continuously mine blocks when it hits a breakable block, but can be manually triggered when on a powered activator rail. This will activate mining and refueling."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.tunnel_bores.4"}]}]
